entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:49 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
